name: Hidden Object Secrets: Family Revenge Collector's Edition
name_original: Hidden Object Secrets: Family Revenge Collector's Edition
description:
This game consists of the best mini-games and item search scenes by DominiGames! You are approached for help in tracking down a successful businessman by his distraught wife. She helps you get into the couple's family nest and you help yourself to their “dirty laundry”. Has the elusive Mr. Jack Jordan gone on an unscheduled business trip or is there something unsavory that hides beneath his smooth talk and oversized wallet? All the evidence leads to his involvement in criminal dealings with his employees. Find the missing man and bring him back home! And do consider training in family therapy in the near future… Gather your wits and intelligence for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

Are you ready to plunge into the world of hidden object games?

FEATURES OF THE HIDDEN OBJECT GAME :

🔎 A grand story
🔎 Unique content
🔎 Own solutions
🔎 Diverse achievements
🔎 Intuitive gameplay
🔎 Collectibles
🔎 Over 100 riddles and puzzles
🔎 Anytime, anywhere
🔎 For old and young

As the detective investigates the disappearance of a successful businessman, evidence of local mafia activity unexpectedly surfaces, and with it, sad events from the past!
